basics.name: Rogelio Vargas
basics.label: Software Enginner
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer specialized in Web Development, passionate about creating innovative solutions that not only meet technical requirements but also generate significant business impact. I am known for my proactive and results-oriented approach, committed to delivering the best in every task. My dedication is reflected in the delivery of high-quality products and projects, backed by my responsibility and constant enthusiasm for continuous improvement.
